sentence.Network_en: I was chatting to an islander who had just caught a fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 我正在跟一个刚刚抓到一条鱼的岛民聊天。

sentence.Network_en: Sophia wouldn't be such damned fool as to love that South Seas Islander!
sentence.Network_cn: 莎菲不会傻到如此地步去爱上南洋人.

sentence.Network_en: Ethnic Composition: descendants of emigrants from Europe - 79.6 %, Maori - 14.5 %, Pacific Islander - 2.9 %, Chinese - 2.25 % , other - 0.75 %.
sentence.Network_cn: 民族: 欧洲移民后裔占79.6%, 毛利族占14.5%, 太平洋岛屿人占2.9%, 华人占 2.25%;其它民族占0.75%.

entry.def: Islanders are people who live on an island.

example.ex: The islanders endured centuries of exploitation.
example.tran: 那个岛上的居民忍受了数个世纪的剥削。

auth_sentence.content: Islander Ann Oyler met the Queen on Tresco during her visit 44 years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: Islander Ann Oyler met the Queen on Tresco during her visit 44 years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Islander Ann Oyler met the Queen on Tresco during her visit 44 years ago.

auth_sentence.content: Being a Falkland Islander is being British in the same way someone from Manchester is English.
auth_sentence.res_content: Being a Falkland Islander is being British in the same way someone from Manchester is English.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Being a Falkland Islander is being British in the same way someone from Manchester is English.

auth_sentence.content: If it were up to me, I would've been any of the diversities: Navajo, Pacific Islander, anything.

sentences.en: The islanders could barely survive without an export crop.
sentences.cn: 没有出口作物，岛上的居民几乎无法生存。
